name: SPEC_ADRENAL_GLAND_INCLUD
description: This table stores information about the inclusion of the adrenal gland in collected specimens.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the specimen record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ADRENAL_GLAND_INCLUDED_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID for whether the adrenal gland is included in the specimen.
